column4: Is there any simple way to remove Ubuntu from my dual boot system?  Everything I've read indicates unless I change the MBR with a windows recovery/set up disc, and I delete the ubuntu partition I'm screwed.
there is a utility in linux that will fix the mbr for windows
looked for it but I can't remember the name
if you boot into windows there may be a utility called fixmbr.. log into ##windows and ask there
